Title: Provides that a fire company may elect to include call firefighters within its membership who shall receive a stipend for each call that he or she responds to
Summary: Provides that a fire company may elect to include call firefighters within its membership who shall receive a stipend for each call that such firefighter responds to.
LawCode: Add ยง201-a, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to call firefighters
